textAfterTable: Kohl's Cash Redemption Notes: Expired Kohl's Cash may be accepted at B&Ms as long as there is still value on it. YMMV. Orders where Kohl's Cash is being redeemed must be placed prior to 11:59PM CT (9:59PM PT, 10:59PM MT, 12:59AM ET) Orders where Kohl's Cash is being earned, orders must be placed after 12:01 AM CT. To confirm, the KC banner will be on the front page and it will say you earned KC in your order confirmation.
